_comment: This file contains the parameters for the graph used to control the temperature within the climate chamber.

max_points.name: max_points
max_points._comment: Amount of points set by the user onto the graph.

min_x.name: min_x
min_x._comment: First setpoint x-value connot be smaller than 0.

min_y.name: min_y
min_y._comment: Minimum achievable temperature in climate chamber.

max_y.name: max_y
max_y._comment: Minimum achievable temperature in climate chamber.

max_rico.name: max_rico
max_rico._comment: Handles how fast temperature can increase or drop. (Tends to be non linear)

sensor_read_delay.name: sensor_read_delay
sensor_read_delay._comment: Handles how fast temperature sensors are read out.
